name: TheFunList
0: ”Alexa ask fun list to give me an idea”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun list
des: This skill is filled with ideas and hacks to do when you are bored. I bet you have been in a situation when you are super bored and you have nothing to do. Simply ask Alexa to give you an idea from the fun list and she will help your misery. The Fun List has simple ideas like going out for a swim to creative things like having an indoor spa day. This skill has ideas for all ages and is fun whether you do them alone or with friends and family.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
